attributes.action: The UK should not rejoin the EU.
attributes.additional_details: We voted in the Referendum to leave the EU and I do not want the UK to rejoin in any way. Examples; immigration of all types is out of control so we do not want freedom of movement and we also wish to leave the ECHR. The EU has proved to be a bloated vastly expensive mistake and we do not want any part of it.
attributes.background: I believe the Government are again reneging on their pre-election promise NOT to take us back into the EU. Vote for us to remain completely OUTSIDE OF THE EU as voted for in the Referendum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the petition below, which calls for similar action: 

Do not seek closer ties with the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710214
